name: Ice cream social
short_description: Let's get this reunion started! Plus ice cream!
long_description: The ice cream social is a great way to kick off the Rendezvous, because you can get reacquainted with old friends, make new friends, and see great cars, all in a great wooded setting. Plus you get a free cone of Kaleidescope's tasty ice cream! This also a chance to pick up your packet for the weekend.

name: Pizza, socializing, and packet pick-up
short_description: Have a slice or two, and maybe a cocktail, at our event hotel. And if you weren't able to make it to the ice cream social, you can pick up your packet for the weekend.
long_description: This is your first chance to check out our new event hotel. We'll have pizza and packet pickup in the lobby, and you can take advantage of the Hyatt bar if you want to relax and imbibe with *amis*. If pizza isn't your thing, dinner options include the hotel, and nearby restaurants in Malta. Of course, you may have an old favorite in Saratoga Springs.

name: Rendezvous Day!
short_description: The show field is open -- lots of cars to check out, vendors are selling their wares, and of course we have merch.
long_description:
This is, of course, the main event. Everyone has their own approach, whether it's examining each car in minute detail, hunting for all the parts on your list from our great group of vendors, or just hanging out. We'll have breakfast options, including coffee, tea, juice, pastries, and bagels to get you started. We've observed that the well prepared often have chairs, an umbrella or awning to escape the sun, and perhaps some refreshments. The folks at Lakeside farms have a great selection of lunch options, and strawberries are in season!
Oh, yes, and don't forget to vote for the People's Choice awards!

name: Silent auction
short_description: See cool stuff, write down your bid. But keep an eye out, in case someone tries to beat your bid! Highest amount wins.
long_description:
Thanks to all the people who donate items for the silent auction! It's a great chance for you to get some cool stuff, and it helps the Rendezvous by being a fund raiser. Sold to the highest bidder!

We really appreciate donations! It's great if they're Citroen- or France-related, but it's not essential. If items are unsold, we return them to the donors.

Sorry, but we can't accept alcoholic beverages for the auction.

name: Break
short_description: We have a bit of downtime - relax!
long_description: We have a bit of a break between the close of showtime and the banquet. The event hotel is quite a bit closer this year, so if you're staying at the Hyatt, it's even an opportunity to have a little snooze.

name: Peoples' Choice Awards
short_description: Find out which cars people really enjoyed seeing!
long_description: Every car is a gem in its own way, but there's no denying that some are standouts. This is our chance to see if out take on the cars lines up with everyone else's, or whether we had a soft spot for that rusty D that no-one else did.

name: Farewell Breakfast
short_description: A last little nibble and good-byes
long_description:
One last hurrah before we head back home. Lakeside Farms supplies a tasty brunch-like breakfast to sustain you on your way. 

May you all have break-down free journeys home!

name: TENTATIVE: Unofficial buffet lunch in Ghent, NY
short_description: Patrick and Astrid Jehanno have offered to host an afternoon meal at their restaurant, Shadow 66, for those homeward bound to the south and east. Details to come.
